title: Stuffed goose with port and Madeira gravy
description: A whole goose is stuffed with a sweet and spicy pearl barley and served with a rich Madeira and port gravy. Save time on Christmas morning by stuffing the goose in advance.
ingredients: 1 oven-ready goose (approximately 5.4kg/12lb), giblets and trimmings reserved
3 free-range eggs, hard-boiled and coarsely grated
½ Bramley apple, peeled and grated
½ bunch sage leaves, finely chopped
½ bunch rosemary leaves, finely chopped
1.5 litres/2½ pint stock (made from the goose trimmings and giblets)
